name: Corrupted Mandrakes
description:
The player is the only mandrake immune to the corruption and you need to fight corrupted mandrakes in the forest to end the corruption. It uses different mechanics like pick up/throw and defeating enemies requires certain methods for different types of enemies.

How To Play:

A: Move Left

D: Move Right

W: JumpE: Intearact with rock you can pick up

Credits: Erik Brekke Larsen - Game Design/Art, Sander Tveitane- Programmer, Even Aslaksen - Programmer, Henning Johannessen - Sound and Simon Ranvik - Art
